title: test_add_update_remove_clear_cart_actions
description: Verify that the cart API correctly handles add, update, remove, and clear actions, updating the cart contents and count accordingly without full page reload.

title: test_get_cart_and_count_via_get_request
description: Verify that the cart API returns correct cart data and item count when accessed via GET requests with action parameters 'get' and 'count'.

title: test_user_address_crud_operations
description: Verify that authenticated users can perform CRUD operations on their delivery addresses, including adding, updating, deleting, and setting a default address, with data integrity maintained.

title: test_list_and_get_address_via_get_request
description: Verify that the addresses API returns the list of user addresses or a specific address when requested via GET with appropriate action and id parameters.

title: test_lgpd_consent_recording
description: Verify that the LGPD API correctly records user consent in session and cookie when a POST request with consent boolean is made.

title: test_admin_get_order_details_authorization
description: Verify that the admin AJAX endpoint for getting order details returns order HTML details for authorized users and returns 401 Unauthorized for unauthorized access.

title: test_admin_update_order_authorization
description: Verify that the admin AJAX endpoint for updating orders processes valid update requests for authorized users and returns 401 Unauthorized for unauthorized access.
